name: Humaning! (Isosymmetric)
description:
HUMANING! The fishing game where you catch humans

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #93. It is my first game in two years, so please be gentle with the feedback :P

What to do

You are a fish swimming around in a pond. Your goal is to catch as big a human as possible! You can do this by casting your bait out of the water and onto the land

Controls

W, S, A, D: makes the fishy swim around

Space: makes the fishy stop swimming around

Right click: (hold and release) casts your bait

Encounters

When you encounter a human biting onto your bait, you will see a flashing screen saying "ENCOUNTER!".

If you click the "Decline" button you will go back to the pond and await your next encounter.

If you click the "Accept" button you will attempt to catch the human. This will take you to the Encounter screen.

On the Encounter screen you need to fill the catching bar by spamming the Space key. Follow the prompts at the top, otherwise you might miss out on getting a really nice catch!

Thank you

Dmitry Timofeev for making the Pixelation Unity Asset

Public Pool for making the two songs I used in my game:

  • Puzzle Town
  • Con Límon
Feedback

Any feedback is welcome. Thank you for taking the time to play my stupid game :P
